name: datetime
unsub: Send an empty email to mailto: datetime-unsubscribe@perl.org
summary: A list for discussion of date and time handling modules in Perl--- what exists, what doesn't exist but should, and how people are handling dates and times (be they Gregorian, Maya, or any other date/time system).
sub: Send an empty email to mailto: datetime-subscribe@perl.org
help: send an empty email to mailto: datetime-help@perl.org
